column6: Why fight super-villains when you can watch attractive ladies take their clothes off in the privacy of their own homes? Ant-Man has got it made! That is until he realizes that the subject of his perverted voyeurism is none other than Ms. Marvel!
column8: | colorist:Bill Crabtree | penciller (cover):Phil Hester | writer:Robert Kirkman | inker:Ande Parks | letterer:Rus Wooton
